subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: With a victory in the Lorena Ochoa Invitational, Michelle Wie finally accomplished what she and many others thought she would do long ago: win an L.P.G.A. event.
snippet: With a victory in the Lorena Ochoa Invitational, Michelle Wie finally accomplished what she and many others thought she would do long ago: win an L.P.G.A. event.
